long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedIn Bigin Integration – Now with AI Insights!

Simplify your CRM workflow with LinkMatch, the perfect LinkedIn Bigin integration tool. Manage contacts, sync data, and save time – all without leaving LinkedIn.

Key Features:
- Save Profiles Instantly: Add LinkedIn profiles (people or organizations) directly to Bigin with one click.
- Automatic Recognition: Instantly see which LinkedIn profiles are already in your Bigin.
- Stay in LinkedIn: View and edit Bigin profile information directly from LinkedIn – no need to switch tabs.
- LinkedIn Message Sync: Automatically sync LinkedIn messages with Bigin for seamless communication tracking.
- NEW – AI Insights: Leverage AI-powered recommendations to prioritize contacts, optimize engagement, and close deals faster.

Whether you're managing customer relationships or generating leads, LinkMatch makes LinkedIn Bigin integration fast, easy, and effective.
By installing this Chrome Extension, you agree to the Terms of Service: https://linkmatch.com/terms-of-use/ 

Browser permissions description for compliance with Chrome WebStore policies:
notifications: To display alerts when profile actions are completed.
https://*.linkedin.com/: To enable integration with LinkedIn.
https://*.xing.com/: To enable integration with Xing.
https://*.zoho.com/: To enable API requests for Zoho (including Bigin).
https://*.linkmatch.net/: API calls to LinkMatch (application server).
